## Abdo Disease 

### Fatty Liver

**Liver:** Normal size and (diffusely) increased parenchymal echogenicity of the liver. 

- **(Mild):** mildly increased parenchymal echogenicity of the liver. 

- **(Moderate):** + with imparied visualization of hepatic vasculature,

- **(Severe):** + with imparied visualization of hepatic vasculature and diaphragm, 

- **(Focal fat sparing):** + A geographic hypoechoic lesion at periportal region, suggestive of focal fat sparing. 

... suggesting of `[mild | moderate | severe]` degree fatty liver disease.

+ No focal lesion. 

**IMPRESSION:** 

- `[Mild | Moderate | Severe]` degree fatty liver disease without focal lesion 
- Otherwise, unremarkable
